tool_description: QuickSearch API provides real-time access to Google search results, supporting both web and image searches.
name: Google QuickSearch
title: Google QuickSearch

api_list.name: Web Search From a single website
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves only web search only from a specified domain.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language. Default: lang_en (sring). Format: lang_<language code>

api_list.name: Image Search From a single website
api_list.description: This endpoint returns data from a specified website only.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language. Default: lang_en. format: lang_<lang ISO code>

api_list.name: Image Search With Page Number
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves images from search with a page number

api_list.name: Image Search
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves images from a image search

api_list.name: Web Search with Page Number
api_list.description: This endpoint return web search according to its page number

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: lang_en. Use this format: lang_pt. (the name lang_<code language>)

api_list.name: Web Search
api_list.description: This endpoint returns data from a web search.
